memberdef.name: DB_DEF_BEGIN
memberdef.initializer: IMPLEMENT_DBPOOL(SeDB##name,4 * 1024,SDTI_##name);\ SeDBInfo SeDB##name::s_kDBInfo;\ SeDBFieldInfo SeDB##name::s_akFieldInfo[SEM_##name##_Num];\ void SeDB##name::Register(void)\ {\ int i = 0;\ DWord dwOffset = 0;\ s_kDBInfo.Clear();\ s_kDBInfo.bCanDelete = can_del;

memberdef.name: DB_BYTE
memberdef.initializer: s_akFieldInfo[i].dwFlag = DFF_BYTE|flag;\ s_akFieldInfo[i].dwOffset = dwOffset;\ s_akFieldInfo[i].iLen = sizeof(Byte);\ strcpy(s_akFieldInfo[i].acName,#name);\ dwOffset += sizeof(Byte);\ if((flag) & DFF_SELECT_DB)\ {\ s_kDBInfo.iSelectDB = i;\ }\ if((flag) & DEF_UPDATE_COND)\ {\ s_kDBInfo.aiUpdateCond.push_back(i);\ }\ i++;

memberdef.name: DB_WORD
memberdef.initializer: s_akFieldInfo[i].dwFlag = DFF_WORD|flag;\ s_akFieldInfo[i].dwOffset = dwOffset;\ s_akFieldInfo[i].iLen = sizeof(Word);\ strcpy(s_akFieldInfo[i].acName,#name);\ dwOffset += sizeof(Word);\ if((flag) & DFF_SELECT_DB)\ {\ s_kDBInfo.iSelectDB = i;\ }\ if((flag) & DEF_UPDATE_COND)\ {\ s_kDBInfo.aiUpdateCond.push_back(i);\ }\ i++;

memberdef.name: DB_NUM
memberdef.initializer: s_akFieldInfo[i].dwFlag = DFF_NUM|flag;\ s_akFieldInfo[i].dwOffset = dwOffset;\ s_akFieldInfo[i].iLen = sizeof(DWord);\ strcpy(s_akFieldInfo[i].acName,#name);\ dwOffset += sizeof(DWord);\ if((flag) & DFF_SELECT_DB)\ {\ s_kDBInfo.iSelectDB = i;\ }\ if((flag) & DEF_UPDATE_COND)\ {\ s_kDBInfo.aiUpdateCond.push_back(i);\ }\ i++;

memberdef.name: DB_NUM64
memberdef.initializer: s_akFieldInfo[i].dwFlag = DFF_NUM64|flag;\ s_akFieldInfo[i].dwOffset = dwOffset;\ s_akFieldInfo[i].iLen = sizeof(uint64_t);\ strcpy(s_akFieldInfo[i].acName,#name);\ dwOffset += sizeof(uint64_t);\ if((flag) & DFF_SELECT_DB)\ {\ s_kDBInfo.iSelectDB = i;\ }\ if((flag) & DEF_UPDATE_COND)\ {\ s_kDBInfo.aiUpdateCond.push_back(i);\ }\ i++;

memberdef.name: DB_STR
memberdef.initializer: s_akFieldInfo[i].dwFlag = DFF_STR|flag;\ s_akFieldInfo[i].dwOffset = dwOffset;\ s_akFieldInfo[i].iLen = len;\ strcpy(s_akFieldInfo[i].acName,#name);\ dwOffset += len;\ if((flag) & DFF_SELECT_DB)\ {\ s_kDBInfo.iSelectDB = i;\ }\ if((flag) & DEF_UPDATE_COND)\ {\ s_kDBInfo.aiUpdateCond.push_back(i);\ }\ i++;

memberdef.name: DB_TIME
memberdef.initializer: s_akFieldInfo[i].dwFlag = DFF_TIME|flag;\ s_akFieldInfo[i].dwOffset = dwOffset;\ s_akFieldInfo[i].iLen = sizeof(SeDBTime);\ strcpy(s_akFieldInfo[i].acName,#name);\ dwOffset += sizeof(SeDBTime);\ if((flag) & DFF_SELECT_DB)\ {\ s_kDBInfo.iSelectDB = i;\ }\ if((flag) & DEF_UPDATE_COND)\ {\ s_kDBInfo.aiUpdateCond.push_back(i);\ }\ i++;

memberdef.name: DB_DEF_END
memberdef.initializer: if(s_kDBInfo.iSelectDB < 0)\ {\ SeLogError("[%s] don't have DFF_SELECT_DB flag!",#name);\ }\ if(s_kDBInfo.aiUpdateCond.size() <= 0)\ {\ SeLogError("[%s] don't have DEF_UPDATE_COND flag!",#name);\ }\ char acFieldString[4096] = {0};\ for(int i = 0;i < SEM_##name##_Num;i++)\ {\ SeDBFieldInfo kField = s_akFieldInfo[i];\ if(i > 0)\ {\ sprintf(acFieldString + strlen(acFieldString),",`%s`",kField.acName);\ }\ else\ {\ sprintf(acFieldString + strlen(acFieldString),"`%s`",kField.acName);\ }\ }\ s_kDBInfo.kFieldString = acFieldString;\ s_kDBInfo.dwVersion = GetCheckCode(&s_akFieldInfo[0],sizeof(SeDBFieldInfo) * SEM_##name##_Num,s_kDBInfo.dwVersion);\ s_kDBInfo.dwVersion = GetCheckCode(&s_kDBInfo.aiUpdateCond[0],sizeof(int) * (int)s_kDBInfo.aiUpdateCond.size(),s_kDBInfo.dwVersion);\ s_kDBInfo.dwVersion = GetCheckCode(&s_kDBInfo.bCanDelete,sizeof(bool),s_kDBInfo.dwVersion);\ s_kDBInfo.dwVersion = GetCheckCode(&s_kDBInfo.iSelectDB,sizeof(int),s_kDBInfo.dwVersion);\ }
